data.eml:eml: A new species, Apseudes larseni (Crustacea: Tanaidacea), from the marine waters of New Zealand

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Knight, Julianne S., Heard, Richard W. (2006): A new species, Apseudes larseni (Crustacea: Tanaidacea), from the marine waters of New Zealand. Zootaxa 1306: 57-67, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.173733
